trans-unit.source: Provides a simple on/off switch that controls debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: Gir et enkelt/på bryteren som styrer feilsøking og sporing utdata.

trans-unit.source: You can use a Boolean trace switch to enable or disable messages based on their importance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en boolsk sporingen bryter å aktivere eller deaktivere meldinger basert på viktigheten.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property to get the current value of the switch.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>til å hente gjeldende verdi for bryteren.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can enable or disable a BooleanSwitch through the application configuration file and then use the configured BooleanSwitch value in your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan aktivere eller deaktivere en BooleanSwitch via programmets konfigurasjonsfil og bruke den konfigurerte verdien for BooleanSwitch i programmet.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can create a BooleanSwitch in your code and set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property directly to instrument a specific section of code.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du opprette en BooleanSwitch i koden og angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>egenskapen direkte til utstyre en bestemt del av koden.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure a BooleanSwitch, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil konfigurere en BooleanSwitch, Rediger konfigurasjonsfilen som tilsvarer navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: Within this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application.
trans-unit.target: I denne filen, kan du legge til eller fjerne en bryter, angi en bryter verdi, eller Fjern alle bytter satt av programmet.

trans-unit.source: The configuration file should be formatted like the following example.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonsfilen må formateres som følgende eksempel.

trans-unit.source: ``` <configuration> <system.diagnostics> <switches> <add name="mySwitch" value="1"/> </switches> </system.diagnostics> </configuration> ``` This example configuration section defines a BooleanSwitch with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.DisplayName%2A> property set to `mySwitch` and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> value set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ``` <configuration> <system.diagnostics> <switches> <add name="mySwitch" value="1"/> </switches> </system.diagnostics> </configuration> ```Denne konfigurasjonsdelen for eksempel definerer en BooleanSwitch med den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.DisplayName%2A>-egenskapen satt til `mySwitch` og <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>verdien satt til `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a BooleanSwitch with the same name, as shown in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: I programmet, kan du bruke konfigurerte switch-verdien ved å opprette en BooleanSwitch med det samme navnet som vises i følgende kodeeksempel.

trans-unit.source: [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.diagnostics.boo_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.diagnostics.boo_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.diagnostics.boo_1.cs)] By default, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property is set using the value specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: [!code-cpp[Klassisk BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch eksempel&2;](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.diagnostics.boo_1.cpp)][!code-vb[klassisk BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch eksempel&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.diagnostics.boo_1.vb)][!code-cs[klassisk BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch eksempel&2;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.diagnostics.boo_1.cs) ] som standard i <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>egenskapen angis ved hjelp av verdien som er angitt i konfigurasjonsfilen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Configure the switch with a value of 0 to set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property to `false`; configure the switch with a nonzero value to set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurer bryteren med verdien 0 for å angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>egenskapen `false`; konfigurere bryteren med en annen verdi for å angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the BooleanSwitch constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property of the new switch is set to `false` by default.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BooleanSwitch konstruktøren ikke finner opprinnelig switch innstillinger i konfigurasjonsfilen, den <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>nye bryteren settes til `false` som standard.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch.
trans-unit.target: Du må aktivere sporing eller feilsøking for å bruke en bryter.

trans-unit.source: The following syntax is compiler specific.
trans-unit.target: Følgende syntaksen er kompilatoren bestemte.

trans-unit.source: If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker kompilatorer enn C# eller Visual Basic, kan du se dokumentasjonen for din kompilator.

trans-unit.source: - To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file.
trans-unit.target: -Feilsøking i C# du legge til den `/d:DEBUG` flagget kompilatoren kommandolinjen når du kompilerer koden, eller du kan legge til `#define DEBUG` til toppen av filen.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line.
trans-unit.target: Legg til i Visual Basic den `/d:DEBUG=True` flagget kompilatoren kommandolinjen.

trans-unit.source: - To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil aktivere sporing i C#, kan du legge til den `/d:TRACE` flagget kompilatoren kommandolinjen når du kompilere koden, eller Legg til `#define TRACE` til toppen av filen.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line.
trans-unit.target: Legg til i Visual Basic den `/d:TRACE=True` flagget kompilatoren kommandolinjen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the BooleanSwitch class in isolation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Disse feilsøke og sporingen kompilatoren skilles ikke nødvendig ved bruk av klassen BooleanSwitch isolert.

trans-unit.source: They are only required in conjunction with <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug> methods that are conditionally compiled.
trans-unit.target: De kreves bare sammen med <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>eller <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>metoder som betinget kompileres.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>

trans-unit.source: For more information on instrumenting your application, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om å utstyre programmet, kan du se <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>og <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>

trans-unit.source: For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om konfigurasjon og bruk av sporing bytter [sporingen bytter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve performance, you can make BooleanSwitch members `static` in your class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å forbedre ytelsen, kan du gjøre BooleanSwitch medlemmer `static` i klassen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch"></xref> class with the specified display name and description.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch"> </xref> klassen med det angitte visningsnavnet og en beskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>, the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>, `displayName` parameteren brukes til å finne første switch innstillingene.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>

trans-unit.source: If the constructor cannot find initial settings, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A> property is set to `false` (disabled).
trans-unit.target: Hvis konstruktøren ikke kan finne første innstillingene i <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>er satt til `false` (deaktivert).</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the level of your <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>, edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application.
trans-unit.target: Angi hvor mange din <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>, Rediger konfigurasjonsfilen svarer til navnet på programmet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch>

trans-unit.source: Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all switches previously set by the application.
trans-unit.target: I denne filen, kan du legge til en bryter og angir verdien, Fjern en bryter, eller Fjern alle bytter tidligere angitt av programmet.

trans-unit.source: The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ``` <configuration> <system.diagnostics> <switches> <add name="mySwitch" value="10" /> <add name="myNewSwitch" value="20" /> <remove name="mySwitch" /> <clear/> </switches> </system.diagnostics> </configuration> ``` > [!NOTE] > The switches you created should be `static`.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonsfilen må formateres som følgende eksempel: ``` <configuration> <system.diagnostics> <switches> <add name="mySwitch" value="10" /> <add name="myNewSwitch" value="20" /> <remove name="mySwitch" /> <clear/> </switches> </system.diagnostics> </configuration> ``` > [!NOTE] > bytter du opprettet må være `static`.

trans-unit.source: The name to display on a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som skal vises på et brukergrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The description of the switch.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen av bryteren.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch"></xref> class with the specified display name, description, and default switch value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch"> </xref> klassen med det angitte visningsnavnet beskrivelse og switch standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.DisplayName%2A> property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den `displayName` parameteren brukes til å angi verdien for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.DisplayName%2A>egenskapen og `description` parameteren bruker til å angi verdien for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Description%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Description%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Value%2A> property on first reference.
trans-unit.target: Den `defaultSwitchValue` parameteren lagres som et felt og brukes til å starte den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Value%2A>egenskapen på første referanse.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about constructor use, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om bruk av konstruktøren, kan du se den <xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The name to display on the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som skal vises i brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The description of the switch.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen av bryteren.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the switch.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for bryteren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the switch is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bryteren er aktivert eller deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: By default, this field is set to `false` (disabled).
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er som standard satt til `false` (deaktivert).

trans-unit.source: To enable the switch, assign this field the value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere bryteren, kan du tilordne dette feltet verdien for `true`.

trans-unit.source: To disable the switch, assign the value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere bryteren tilordne verdien til `false`.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is determined by the value of the base class property <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen bestemmes av verdien for egenskapen basisklassen <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method uses the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> flag to prevent being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> permission.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden bruker den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>Flagg for å hindre blir kalt fra uklarerte kode; bare umiddelbar Oppkalleren må ha <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tillatelse.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass the user input to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal> class methods without validation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koden kan bare kalles fra delvis klarert kode, ikke bestått brukerinndata til <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>klasse metoder uten validering.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the switch is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis bryteren er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the correct permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har riktige tillatelser.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the new value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Value*> property can be parsed as a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Value*>egenskapen kan analyseres som en boolsk verdi.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The OnValueChanged method determines whether the new value is a valid string representation of a Boolean value ("false" or "true").
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnValueChanged bestemmer om den nye verdien er en gyldig gjengivelse av en boolsk verdi ("false" eller "true").

trans-unit.source: If so, the method sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A> property to 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette er tilfellet, metoden angir den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>egenskapen til 0 eller 1.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the base method is called, which converts the string value to an integer value, which is then used to set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ellers metoden base kalles, som konverterer strengverdien til en heltallsverdi, som deretter brukes til å angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Switch.SwitchSetting%2A>
